  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113882</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113882</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Amplitude-time graph for damped oscillations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang-Zeit Diagramm für Dämpfung 
Pendelbewegungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique d'Amplitude-temps pour des oscillations
atténuées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráfico do Amplitude-tempo para oscilações 
umedecidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafico di Ampiezza-tempo per le oscillazioni 
smorzate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρος-χρονική γραφική παράσταση για τις μετριασμένες 
ταλαντώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gráfico del Amplitud-tiempo para las 
oscilaciones humedecidas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph illustrates the relationship of amplitude and time for damped oscillations. Half-life is determined by finding the time it takes to decrease to half the graph's initial amplitude.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">damping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscillations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm veranschaulicht das 
Verhältnis des Umfanges und der Zeit für Dämpfung Pendelbewegungen.
Halbwertzeit wird festgestellt, indem man die Zeit findet, die 
sie zur Abnahme zur Hälfte des Ausgangsder umfang Diagramms dauert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne illustre le rapport de 
l'amplitude et de l'heure pour des oscillations atténuées. La 
demi vie est déterminée en trouvant le temps où elle prend à la 
diminution à la moitié de l'amplitude initiale du graphique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico ilustra o relacionamento da 
amplitude e da hora para oscilações umedecidas. O half-life é
determinado encontrando o tempo onde faz exame à diminuição à 
metade da amplitude inicial do gráfico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare illustra il rapporto di 
ampiezza e di tempo per le oscillazioni smorzate. Il periodo 
radioattivo è determinato trovando il tempo che occorre a diminuzione
alla metà di ampiezza iniziale del grafico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών επεξηγεί τη σχέση 
του εύρους και του χρόνου για τις μετριασμένες ταλαντώσεις. 
Η ημιζωή καθορίζεται με την εύρεση του χρόνου που παίρνει 
για να μειωθεί στο μισό αρχικό εύρος της γραφικής παράστασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico ilustra el lazo de la 
amplitud y de la hora para las oscilaciones humedecidas. El 
período es determinado encontrando el tiempo que lleva la 
disminución a la mitad de la amplitud inicial del gráfico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämpfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">atténuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demi vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oscillations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">umedecer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oscilações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ampiezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inumidirsi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">periodo radioattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oscillazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εύρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόσβεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
